values: Grease is an oily substance put on moving parts so they work smoothly, or oil or fat in cooking.
When I was done working on the car, I had grease all over my hands.
n.油脂
滑脂油

- n. 动物油脂
- 油膏, 油脂
- vt. 涂油脂于, 用油脂润滑

greased, greasing, greases  

形容词:

形容词:
